LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analyzer
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Build multi-analyzers which increase research speed and allow higher-level research projects. Requires advanced components to construct.
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.label: ground-penetrating scanner
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.description: Build ground-penetrating scanners that can detect drillable resources under the surface. Requires advanced components to construct.
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.label: deep drilling
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.description: Build deep drills for extracting resources from underground. You'll need a ground-penetrating scanner to find the resources.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: vitals monitor
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: Build vitals monitors which improve medical outcomes when placed next to hospital beds.
LanguageData.Fabrication.label: fabrication
LanguageData.Fabrication.description: Build fabrication benches, capable of high-tech projects ranging from component assembly to power armor construction.
LanguageData.AdvancedFabrication.label: advanced fabrication
LanguageData.AdvancedFabrication.description: Fabricate advanced components from standard components and other materials.
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.label: cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.description: Construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of indefinite suspended animation.
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.label: powered armor
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.description: Build the power armor and power armor helmets. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.ChargedShot.label: pulse-charged munitions
LanguageData.ChargedShot.description: Build weapons which fire pulse-charged munitions for extra damage. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.Bionics.label: bionics
LanguageData.Bionics.description: Build high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
